cakes.name: Chocolate-Cake
cakes.specification: flour, sugar, cocoa powder, leavening agents (baking powder or baking soda), eggs, a liquid (milk, buttermilk, or water), and a fat (butter, oil, or a combination)

cakes.name: Butter-Cake
cakes.description: a rich, moist, and flavorful cake made with butter, flour, sugar, eggs, and a leavening agent like baking powder
cakes.specification: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, softened butter, eggs, baking powder, salt, and a liquid like milk or buttermilk

cakes.name: Red-Velvet-Cake
cakes.description: a red-colored layer cake with cream cheese or ermine icing
cakes.specification: flour, sugar, cocoa powder, buttermilk, eggs, baking soda, baking powder, and red food coloring

cakes.name: Vanila-Cake
cakes.description: this classic cake is flavorful and has a tender and moist crumb
cakes.specification: flour, sugar, leavening agents (like baking powder and baking soda), eggs, a liquid (like milk or buttermilk), and a fat (like butter or oil), along with vanilla extract for flavor

cakes.name: Fruit-Cake
cakes.description: a dense, sweet cake traditionally made with candied or dried fruits, nuts, and spices
cakes.specification: a base of flour, sugar, eggs, and butter, with a generous addition of dried fruits like raisins, currants, and mixed peel. Spices such as cinnamon, nutmeg, and allspice are also common, along with nuts like walnuts or almonds

cakes.name: Chessecake-Cake
cakes.description: a dessert characterized by its rich, creamy, and sometimes tangy filling, typically made with cheese, eggs, and sugar, often set over a crust
cakes.specification: cream cheese, eggs, sugar, sour cream, and vanilla extract

pastries.name: Croissant-Pastries
pastries.description: a crescent-shaped, flaky pastry traditionally made with laminated dough, where layers of butter are incorporated into the dough
pastries.specification: laminated yeast dough, requiring flour, sugar, salt, yeast, milk, water, and butter. A key ingredient is the butter, which is used for both the dough and as a layer within the dough to create the flaky texture

pastries.name: Chocolate-Pastries
pastries.description: baked goods that incorporate chocolate in their flavor and/or appearance
pastries.specification: flour, sugar, eggs, and butter, plus cocoa powder for the chocolate flavor

pastries.name: Donuts
pastries.description: a popular fried pastry, typically ring-shaped with a hole in the center
pastries.specification: flour, sugar, eggs, and some form of fat or leavening agent. Additional ingredients like milk, buttermilk, salt, vanilla extract, and spices

pastries.name: Danish-Pastries
pastries.description: sweet, laminated pastries, often characterized by their flaky, buttery texture and variety of fillings and toppings
pastries.specification: flour, yeast, milk, eggs, sugar, and a large amount of butter or margarine. The dough is rolled out, layered with butter, and folded repeatedly to create multiple layers

pastries.name: Cinnamon-Roll-Pastries
pastries.description: soft, fluffy dough filled with a cinnamon-sugar mixture, often topped with a cream cheese or sugar glaze
pastries.specification: a dough, a cinnamon filling, and optionally a glaze or icing. The dough often includes flour, yeast, milk, butter, sugar, and eggs. The filling usually features butter, brown sugar, and cinnamon, with variations including other spices like cardamom or nutmeg. A cream cheese glaze or a simple powdered sugar glaze can be added on top

pastries.name: Biscuit-Pastry-Pastries
pastries.description: small, quick breads, typically made with flour, fat (like butter or shortening), and a leavening agent like baking powder or baking soda
pastries.specification: flour, fat (like butter or shortening), a liquid (like milk or buttermilk), and leavening agents (like baking powder)

cookies.name: Chocolate-Cookies
cookies.description: buttery flavor and the inclusion of chocolate chips
cookies.specification: butter (or shortening), sugar (both white and brown), flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, eggs, and vanilla extract

cookies.name: Shortbread-Cookies
cookies.description: a traditional Scottish biscuit or cookie characterized by their crumbly, melt-in-your-mouth texture and rich, buttery flavor
cookies.specification: made from one part white sugar, two parts butter and three to four parts plain wheat flour

cookies.name: Sandwich-Cookies
cookies.description: a type of cookie that consists of two smaller cookies or wafers, joined together with a layer of filling

cookies.name: Butter-Cookies
cookies.description: consisting of butter, flour, and sugar
cookies.specification: flour, sugar, butter, eggs, and flavorings and a filling

cookies.name: Oatmeal-Rasins-Cookies
cookies.description: a type of drop cookie made from an oatmeal-based dough with raisins
cookies.specification: flour, oats, butter, sugar (both granulated and brown), eggs, vanilla extract, baking soda, and spices like cinnamon and nutmeg. Raisins are, of course, a key ingredient

cookies.name: Gingerbread-Cookies
cookies.description: sweet baked goods, typically cookies or cakes, flavored with ginger and other spices like cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg, and sweetened with honey or molasses
cookies.specification: flour, spices (ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves), a sweetener (brown sugar, molasses, or golden syrup), and leavening agents like baking soda or baking powder

pies.name: Cream-Pies
pies.description: a dessert featuring a one-crust pie shell filled with a rich custard or pudding
pies.specification: milk, cream, sugar, eggs, and sometimes flour or cornstarch for thickening. A common topping is whipped cream

pies.name: Custard-Pies
pies.description: a classic dessert featuring a flaky pie crust filled with a rich, creamy, and often slightly spiced egg custard
pies.specification: pie crust, eggs, sugar, milk (or cream), salt, and flavorings like vanilla and/or nutmeg

pies.name: Pumpkin-Pies
pies.description: a sweet dessert pie typically made with a spiced pumpkin-based custard filling baked in a pastry crust
pies.specification: sugar, pumpkin pie spice, salt,  pumpkin (not pumpkin pie mix) ,evaporated milk, beaten eggs, frozen pillsbury and deep dish pie crusts

pies.name: Fruit-Pies
pies.description: a baked pastry dessert filled with various fruits
pies.specification: This recipe calls for eight small Granny Smith apples. Butter and flour: The filling starts with butter and all-purpose flour cooked into a paste. Sugars: A blend of white and brown sugar creates the perfect sweet flavor with a hint of warmth

pies.name: Meat-Pies
pies.description: a baked pastry dish containing a savory filling of meat, often with other ingredients like vegetables and gravy
pies.specification: a pie crust made with flour, butter, salt, and water, and a filling of minced meat, onions, carrots, potatoes, and seasonings like thyme, garlic powder, and beef bouillon

pies.name: Pecan-Pies
pies.description: a classic American dessert characterized by its rich, nutty filling and flaky, buttery crust
pies.specification: pecan nuts mixed with a filling of eggs, butter and sugar. Variations may include white or brown sugar, cane syrup, sugar syrup, molasses, maple syrup, or honey
